data: eastern coast of the mountain above Port Louis | piece of land bearing marks of former cultivation
On the eastern coast of the mountain which rises above Port Louis in the Mauritius, upon a piece of land bearing the marks of former cultivation, are seen the ruins of two small cottages.
Paul and Virginia from the French of J.B.H. de Saint Pierre
